description: woman with black ear-length hair with bangs dressed in a black dress sits in a landscape with hands folded in her lap; she leans slightly to the left; background on the bottom of the image is colored in a blue-green; middle ground is in a coral color with a row of black trees; upper half of the image is blue sky with black birds; the woman's eyes are lined in blue and there are two coral colored circles on her cheeks
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E 82-Schwarzstein II. Fassung-handkoloriert E. | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2015
title: Girl at the Lake (Sonia Gramatté)
